attributes.action: Make Sure The Police Are Policed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Police should not be able to get away with things that civilians wouldn't be able to get away with. Even though they technically have the same rights as civiallians they take their role as an advantage to themselves. They should also consider whether some 999 calls are as much as an emergency as are made out on the phone.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
